title: Pset_SensorTypeHumiditySensor
description: A device that senses or detects humidity. HISTORY: HumiditySensorSetPoint changed to SetPointHumidity. Range, accuracy and time constant deleted.

SetPointHumidity.title: SetPointHumidity
SetPointHumidity.description: The humidity value to be sensed. Use IfcPropertyBoundedValue.SetPointValue to set the set point value.
